description: Detects unusual processes accessing desktop.ini, which can be leveraged to alter how Explorer displays a folder's content (i.e. renaming files) without changing them on disk. Author: Maxime Thiebaut (@0xThiebaut), Tim Shelton (HAWK.IO). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Operations performed through Windows SCCM or equivalent
name: Suspicious desktop.ini Action
query: (file.path:*\\desktop.ini AND (NOT (process.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*))))
